reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 12/01: APPEALS FROM PENALTIES IMPOSED UNDER THE MARKET RULES
reg_info.reg_name_text: appeals from penalties imposed under the market rules
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 12/01: APPEALS FROM PENALTIES IMPOSED UNDER THE MARKET RULES

content.content: 1. The amount of $10,000 is prescribed for the purpose of clause 36 (1) (a) of the Act.  O. Reg. 12/01, s. 1.
